name: Ethylene (Ethene)

energies.comment: Simple C=C double bond + 4 C-H bonds. Should decompose cleanly - no cycles, no resonance. Small deviation (~1-2%) expected from measurement uncertainty. Naive: 602 + 4×413 = 2254, actual ~2275 (0.9% deviation).

notes: Ethylene: simplest alkene with C=C double bond
No cycles, no resonance, no special structure
Should show near-zero violation (additivity should work)
Control case: tests that detector doesn't overfit
π-bond is localized between two carbons (not delocalized like benzene)
